variable.name: bcr_sample_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual tissue sample(public CDE id 2673864)

variable.name: bcr_analyte_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual analyte purified from tissue(public CDE id 2673835)

variable.name: bcr_aliquot_barcode
variable.description: Aliquot barcode identifier

variable.name: aliquot_amount
variable.description: The total amount, in micrograms, of molecular analyte purified from the tissue sample.(public CDE id 2673838)

variable.name: aliquot_concentration
variable.description: The concentration in micrograms/microliter of molecular analyte purified from a tissue sample.(public CDE id 2673837)

variable.name: day_of_shipment
variable.description: Day of specimen shipment

variable.name: month_of_shipment
variable.description: Month of specimen shipment

variable.name: plate_column
variable.description: Column number of microplate well

variable.name: plate_row
variable.description: Row letter of microplate well

variable.name: year_of_shipment
variable.description: Year of specimen shipment

variable.name: a260_a280_ratio
variable.description: The ratio of UV absorbance at 260nm to absorbance at 280nm(public CDE id 2673841)

variable.name: analyte_amount
variable.description: The total amount, in micrograms, of molecular analyte purified from the tissue sample.(public CDE id 2673838)

variable.name: analyte_type
variable.description: Description of analyte

variable.name: analyte_concentration
variable.description: The concentration in micrograms/microliter of molecular analyte purified from a tissue sample.(public CDE id 2673837)

variable.name: gel_image_file
variable.description: The name of the file containing the gel image(public CDE id 2673842)

variable.name: spectrophotometer_method
variable.description: Name of the method used to determine the concentration of purified nucleic acid within a solution.(public CDE id 3008378)

variable.name: normal_tumor_genotype_match
variable.description: Test result for detecting match between normal and tumor genotype

variable.name: pcr_amplification_successful
variable.description: Was PCR amplification successful?

variable.name: experimental_protocol_type
variable.description: Type of experimental protocol

variable.name: ratio_28s_18s
variable.description: 28S:18S rRNA ratio

variable.name: rinvalue
variable.description: RNA integrity number value

variable.name: current_weight
variable.description: The current weight, in grams, of the tissue sample(public CDE id 2673870)

variable.name: freezing_method
variable.description: The method by which the tumor was frozen (Liquid N2 Vapor, Dry Ice, -80, -20)(public CDE id 2673871)

variable.name: initial_weight
variable.description: The weight, in grams, of the tissue sample when it was received(public CDE id 2673869)

variable.name: intermediate_dimension
variable.description: The second longest dimension, in cm, of the tumor(public CDE id 2673867)

variable.name: longest_dimension
variable.description: The longest dimension, in cm, of the tumor(public CDE id 2673866)

variable.name: method_of_sample_procurement
variable.description: Text term that describes the method of which tumor/cancer tissue is removed from a patient.(public CDE id 3103514)

variable.name: oct_embedded
variable.description: Was the tumor OCT embedded (Yes/No)(public CDE id 2673872)

variable.name: sample_type
variable.description: The specimen type (tumor, tissue matched normal, other normal)(public CDE id 2673865)
variable.value: Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Bone Marrow
Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood
Recurrent Blood Derived Cancer - Bone Marrow
Recurrent Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood

variable.name: shortest_dimension
variable.description: The shortest dimension, in cm, of the tumor(public CDE id 2673868)

variable.name: time_between_clamping_and_freezing
variable.description: Time, in minutes, between vascular clamping and tissue freezing(public CDE id 2673873)

variable.name: time_between_excision_and_freezing
variable.description: Time, in minutes, between surgical excision and tissue freezing(public CDE id 2673874)
